result.reason: The issue requests separate storage for hostname and IP addresses, which is an enhancement to provide more granular control and clarity in connection definitions.
result.approach: Introduce new properties (e.g., 'IPAddress' and a flag/enum for connection type) in AbstractConnectionRecord. Modify the existing 'Hostname' property to support the new structure. Update the XML serialization/deserialization logic in XmlConnectionNodeSerializer28 for backward compatibility. Finally, update the connection property editor UI (likely FrmConnection.cs) to expose these new fields for user input.
